welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pocono, the charming mountain town known for its scenic beauty and outdoor adventures. We are excited to have you here and invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mt Pocono Airport serves domestic flights to major cities in the United States.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mt Pocono Airport handles freight and cargo flights to various destinations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wilkes-Barre/Scranton International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
